com.adobe.cq.social.review.client.api

Class ReviewCollectionSocialComponentFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.cq.social.scf.core.AbstractSocialComponentFactory
      • com.adobe.cq.social.review.client.api.ReviewCollectionSocialComponentFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SocialComponentFactory

    @Service
public class ReviewCollectionSocialComponentFactory
extends AbstractSocialComponentFactory
implements SocialComponentFactory
    Social Comment Component Factory which allows the framework to create an SocialComponent for a Review resource.
